title: how to disable adding recently visited sites to top sites?
content:
It annoys me very much that you cannot disable this in the user settings, but most likely it can be in the settings for developers (about:config), but I do not know which specific parameter turns this off. Of course, I can turn off the history altogether and then the sites will not be added, but this is not an option.

So, how can I disable adding sites based on my requests and visited pages in the top sites?
creator: obainkyyyy

title: Firefox Bookmarked All My Tabs Thousands of Times
content:
So uh. This is bizarre. This has been going on for a couple weeks now - since the unremovable Other Bookmarks button appeared, though I *have* since removed that - but basically, I've had a lot of tabs open for a while now. Well over 100 of them. 99% of them were unloaded and just there for me to go back to whenever, that's not usually a problem for me, it doesn't lag my browser.

What *does* lag my browser is opening my bookmarks. Because Firefox has taken these 100+ tabs and bookmarked all of them. Thousands of times. There are over 170,000 bookmarks bogging down my browser and they're all these exact same tabs, over and over and over and over and over again. Obviously, I never did this. This just up and happened one day.

I managed to scroll through all of them, and couldn't find *any* of my *actual* bookmarks whatsoever. They're all gone. All I have are these tabs, over and over. What the hell is going on, and how do I fix this?
creator: werefallingup

title: Quick Launch Bar Windows 10
content:
Hi community,

when I right-click on Firefox's Quick Launch icon in Windows 10, the pinned and recently accessed pages appear. How can I edit the order of the pinned pages?

Best regards Voltadino

title: prefs1.js file Keeps filling up drive
content:
Hello

On number of our computers user-->username-->AppData-->Roaming-->Mozilla-->Firefox-->Profiles--> Random letters and Numbers.default a File prefs1 keeps getting so large it fills up the drives>

Any thoughts on how to stop this
creator: richard.detrafford

title: Youtube images are blurry
content:
Thumbnails, icons and channel art are blurry and pixelated whenever I browse YouTube as a Brand Account. There's no issue when I use my Owner Account or whenever I sign out, but switching back to my Brand Account downgrades the image quality.

I've tried clearing cookies and site data, using safe mode, and disabling add-ons.
creator: introvert4life

title: Extensions
content: I installed Firefox onto my third device, and it synced my data, including my extensions. The only thing is, they don't show up in my tool bar like they do on my other devices. I tried several different things, but the icons for the extensions don't even show up in the customization tab. They don't autofill or work at all, despite saying that they are installed and active.
creator: gocoda

title: bookmarks
content:
When I installed Firefox all my favorites from Windows came over as bookmarks. I want to separate these some how, because I don't want 50 bookmarks. What's the best way.

Michael
creator: maanderson2006

title: retrieve my saved passwords on Firefox after reinstalling windows
content:
Hi everyone,
